ModMetaData.name: Begone, Message!
ModMetaData.author: lbmaian
ModMetaData.description: Begone, Message! You know those messages on food rotting and relations decaying and so forth that annoyingly block some of the colonist bar at the top? This mod allows you to: * Dismiss a message by right-clicking that message. * Dismiss all messages by shift-right-clicking any message.
